apiKey.label: Composio API Key
apiKey.help: API key from composio.dev dashboard (or use ${COMPOSIO_API_KEY})

defaultEntityId.label: Default Entity ID
defaultEntityId.help: Composio entity ID to use when no channel-specific entity is mapped

entityMapPath.label: Entity Map Path
entityMapPath.help: Path to entity-map.json for multi-tenant channel -> Composio entity mapping

toolkits.label: Enabled Toolkits
toolkits.help: List of Composio toolkit names to register (e.g. gmail, googlecalendar, slack)

toolPrefix.label: Tool Prefix
toolPrefix.help: Prefix for registered tool names (e.g. composio_gmail_send_email)

connectLinkRedirect.label: Connect Link Redirect URL
connectLinkRedirect.help: Redirect URL after OAuth authorization completes
